name: Infernal Rotation
description:
Infernal Rotation  -  is a relaxing challenging game for you to pass the time when you have no internet or for example on a long and long road :)

 The game boasts: 

- quite simple controls

- relaxing music

- nice, simple and atmospheric graphics. 

CONTROLS

Just tap the screen and dodge blocks, collecting "bonuses" along the way. "bonuses" is an in-game currency that will be used in the future, but for now you can just accumulate them by playing for the record. 

Play and set new records! compete with your friends, who can last the longest in this game?) 

The game is currently under development, stay tuned for updates. We look forward to your feedback and ratings! we are always ready and happy to listen to the opinion of the players.
